channel.title: CVE Feed for inc2734 -- Smart Custom Fields
channel.description: The latest CVEs for inc2734 -- Smart Custom Fields

item.title: CVE-2024-1995|2024-08-01T18:56:22.690Z -- inc2734 -- smart%20custom%20fields
item.description: The Smart Custom Fields plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the relational_posts_search() function in all versions up to, and including, 4.2.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscrber-level access and above, to retrieve post content that is password protected and/or private.

item.title: CVE-2024-1995|2024-03-20T01:58:04.811Z -- inc2734 -- smart%20custom%20fields
item.description: The Smart Custom Fields plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the relational_posts_search() function in all versions up to, and including, 4.2.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscrber-level access and above, to retrieve post content that is password protected and/or private.
